column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Two of my other friends prefer the Cha Cha Cha which they claim is their "Ramen for Garlic Lovers." As a major Garlic Lover
column2: it barely tastes or even smells enough like garlic for me so..... I tried it once but never ordered it again. Don't let me deter you from tryin it; it's good
column3: but just not near as good as my Black ; p
